tossup_question: -  11)  – 	Which of the following types of cells has the longest lifespan in circulation?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Erythrocyte [uh-ree-throh-sight]
X) Platelet
Y) Monocyte
Z) Neutrophil [nyoo-troh-fil]
bonus_question: -   –  What model in population genetics predicts that allele frequencies will stay constant from generation to generation, assuming that the population remains free of other evolutionary influences?
